description:
To rid Bubble Town of its rodent problem, Cubix, Connor and a smelly Exterminator Robot shrink down to invade a mouse colony, but they wind up face to face with a cat who`s a rat- and at the mercy of the big feet of Chip, Mong and Abby, who can`t see them!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: コンボック, ネズミ退治だ!
